segments.text: I see the water cascading over the sink’s edge; it’s like a miniature waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it only adds to the tension in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains blissfully unaware as the puddle grows larger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on drying that plate is almost obsessive; it's a bit unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: When the boy finally grabs a cookie, I feel a strange mix of joy and fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What are they thinking? This can’t end well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That kitchen could easily turn from a scene of domesticity to chaos in seconds.
segments.speaker: PAR
